title: Windows 64 bit error
body:
I played a game of league with my friends, 3 hours later i went in to play again when it suddenly appears with a error.
Unsupported 16-Bit Application

The program or feature "\??\C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.0133\deploy\LolClient.exe" cannot start or run due to incompatibility with 64-bit versions of Windows. Please contact the software vendor to ask if a 64-biy Windows compatible version is available.

I have no idea why this error suddenly appears or how to fix it.
ps i have tryed reinstalling the game and running as an adminstrator.

replies.body:
Does this happen upon trying to launch League or does it happen when you try launching into a match?

Ensure you're running League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** from the installation folder by right clicking it and running it *as an administrator*.
This happened to me today, running as admin didnt work. Trying reinstall now, but if that doesnt work did anyone come up with a fix?
Well i fixed it by reinstalling like 5 times and it works now.
it happenned to me today...and this will be fking third time that i do that i hope it will works by your way
i have the same problem since the update with new yasuo and riven skin pls tell me what to do
i have this same problem, and reinstalling it and running it as an administrator wont work. Please help
